channel.title: Nuke Blaster -- gun im making [wip]
channel.description: well i had a maths lesson, yeah boring stuff lol so i doodled, and i came up with this :P im still working on it btw ok edit here for guy saying handle is too squarish.. have you played runescape lol tel me when you see a round handle.. tbh i rounded it and im not going to make it any more rounded cos it would look retarded on an rsps plus it would only be on like a 317 - 508 and lets face it.. they dont have the 'best' graphics

item.title: Nuke Blaster -- gun im making [wip]
item.dc:creator: @cashisfun cashisfun
item.description:
@cashisfun wrote:

[quote=“Mod Whip, post:6, topic:389064”][quote author=Strangle link=topic=484878.msg3553743#msg3553743 date=1301713182]
the handle looks rather awkward imo… it looks to Squarish… though i’ve only made a few guns before i cant really say anything…
[/quote]
What weapons in rs don’t look “squarish” around the handle lol?
imo this looks great, keep it up. Probably won’t add to my server personally, I’m not a huge fan of this kind of customs.[/quote]

thanks man and yeah i dont really like guns on rsps that much i only made this cos it was an idea in my head but i guessed if it was gunna be posted on mopar then i would make it kinda suited for one

Read full topic
